title: NAME YOUR NATIONALITY!
body:
What the title says, also if you're proud to be that nationality.

I'm Samoan, but sadly despise my kind.
I'm being honest

replies.body:
I am half Aussie and half Welsh

You shouldn't despise your race, every single one I have met have been among the nicest people I know. you guys know how to take a joke and know how to throw one back. Just great people in my opinion.

> [{quoted}](name=GPuL Megg,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qkLAEuIx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-04T11:41:25.311+0000)
>
> I am half Aussie and half Welsh
> 
> You shouldn't despise your race, every single one I have met have been among the nicest people I know. you guys know how to take a joke and know how to throw one back. Just great people in my opinion.

Nation =/= race.

Not to mention, race was a concept invented when they had no idea all humans share the same species. It's should have long vanished into obscurity by now.

But your point is positive and I definitely respect that.

Why you despise your nation though.

One can just not like where they are from, which is  understandable but hating it seems to be just a bit too much.

I don't hate my country, I hate the people, the 'FOB's' (Fresh of the Boat if you don't know what that means).
I'd rather be a palagi (if you're my nationality you'd know what this means) than to be my 'race'.
We're so out going and joyful and loving and gentle when with other people, which I love about my nationality.
But when Samoans / Tongans / Cook Islander's try to show off, laugh at you for countless weeks, you get sick of it. My mum's family is a great example of gratitude and kindness.  My dad's side I couldn't bother about them, I'd rather ***************************** than to be in that family.

So again, to clarify, I love my nation, but I hate the people who call themselves 'A fully fleged FOB'.

Greek, Aussie and Cyprian.

Greece is goin to shit, Australia is going to shit unless we get a new PM, nobody gives a fuck about Cyprus lel, got no problem with any of these but i must say Aussies can be real %%%%s sometimes but luckily all these %%%%s have left my life, for now...

Im a Malaysian and im not proud of my country because the government sucks but i love the people living in Malaysia and i do love Malaysia as a country. I just hate the government that's all. My race is Chinese and both my parents and i were born in Malaysia.

Aussie with anglo heritage.  Bit of welsh bit of german or something. Family has been in oz for a while and i dont have much idea about my European heritage. 

Op why did you say you don't like "your kind"?

Well, if you look at the 'typical FOB' or 'Samoan', they are big, buff, outgoing and very friendly :D
I've only inherited one of those traits, that is being very friendly. There are many FOB's that are too noisy, big, 'they-think-they're-really-good-at-something' kind of person and all of that.
I don't like those type of people.

That is why I say '*my kind*'
Indian, not many of my indian friends play lol though :(
Cook Island Maori. You're absolutely disgusting for despising your own ethnicity. I fucking hate Samoans with a passion, but you're downright pathetic in my books.

Hey hey, I think i noticed that I'm pathetic, I'm not trying to be an attention seeker, it's just I love my country and all, but the people who inhabit it fuking annoy me, so loud, don't know when to FUK off, don't know when enough is enough.
I've had so many emotional scars from one fuking event, and that event won't be fuking mentioned because my shity cousin knows alot about it.
